justification: This data clump is chosen due to the high impact it has across multiple files, namely src/argouml-app/src/org/argouml/ui/JasonsBigTheme.java and src/argouml-app/src/org/argouml/ui/JasonsHugeTheme.java. Since both classes have highly similar sets of instance variables related to UI theme configuration, it indicates a strong possibility of shared behavior that could be centralized. Refactoring this clump into a separate class could simplify theme management and promote code reusability across different theme configurations.
